comment:
После того как увидели барку, на трупе появляется действие CutCorruptedFlesh_action. 
По клику на экшен с мерзким мясистым звуком в инвентарь добавляем CorruptedFleshPart_item

languages.text: Труп бродяги, чье тело изуродовано роговыми наростами и то и дело появляющимися и исчезающими в океане его плоти глазами, пастями и щупальцами. Столь сильное искажение варпом трудно спутать с чем-то другим.

traits.locale_text: Труп бродяги, чье тело изуродованно роговыми наростами и то и дело появляющимися и исчезающими в океане его плоти глазами, пастями и щупальцами. Столь сильное искажение варпом трудно спутать с чем-то другим.

languages.text: The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for anything else.
languages.original_text: Труп бродяги, чье тело изуродовано роговыми наростами и то и дело появляющимися и исчезающими в океане его плоти глазами, пастями и щупальцами. Столь сильное искажение варпом трудно спутать с чем-то другим.

traits.locale_text: The vagabond's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for something else.

The vagabond's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for something else.

The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for something else.

The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for something else.

The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for anything else.

The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for anything else.

languages.text: 乞食の死体は骨の成長で醜くなっている。目、口、触手が絶えず肉の海に現れては消えている。これほど深刻な歪みのディストーションを見間違えることなど、ほとんどないだろう。
languages.original_text: The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for anything else.

traits.locale_text: 乞食の死体は骨の成長で醜くなっている。目、口、触手が絶えず肉の海に現れては消えている。これほど深刻な歪みのディストーションを見間違えることなど、ほとんどないだろう。

languages.text: 乞丐的尸体由于骨骼增生而不成样子。在血肉的海洋之中，眼睛、嘴巴和触手不断地出现、消失。毫无疑问，这是极为严重的亚空间腐化导致的结果。
languages.original_text: The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for anything else.

traits.locale_text: 乞丐的尸体由于骨骼增生而不成样子。在血肉的海洋之中，眼睛、嘴巴和触手不断地出现、消失。毫无疑问，这是极为严重的亚空间腐化导致的结果。

languages.text: El cadáver del mendigo está desfigurado por crecimientos óseos. Ojos, bocas y tentáculos aparecen y desaparecen constantemente en el océano de su carne. Una distorsión de la disformidad de esta categoría es inconfundible.
languages.original_text: The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for anything else.

traits.locale_text: El cadáver del mendigo está desfigurado por crecimientos óseos. Ojos, bocas y tentáculos aparecen y desaparecen constantemente en el océano de su carne. Una distorsión de la disformidad de esta categoría es inconfundible.

languages.text: Der Leichnam des Bettlers ist durch knöcherne Auswüchse entstellt. Augen, Münder und Tentakel erscheinen unaufhörlich in dem Ozean seines Fleischs und verschwinden wieder. Warp-Verzerrungen dieser Schwere kann man kaum mit irgendetwas anderem verwechseln.
languages.original_text: The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for anything else.

traits.locale_text: Der Leichnam des Bettlers ist durch knöcherne Auswüchse entstellt. Augen, Münder und Tentakel erscheinen unaufhörlich in dem Ozean seines Fleischs und verschwinden wieder. Warp-Verzerrungen dieser Schwere kann man kaum mit irgendetwas anderem verwechseln.

languages.text: Le corps du mendiant est déformé par des protubérances osseuses. Des yeux, des bouches et même des tentacules ne cessent d'apparaître et de disparaître sur l'océan de sa chair. Vous n'aviez encore jamais vu un cas de distorsion du Warp d'une telle sévérité.
languages.original_text: The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for anything else.

traits.locale_text: Le corps du mendiant est déformé par des protubérances osseuses. Des yeux, des bouches et même des tentacules ne cessent d'apparaître et de disparaître sur l'océan de sa chair. Vous n'aviez encore jamais vu un cas de distorsion du Warp d'une telle sévérité.

languages.text: Dilencinin bedeni, kemiksi yapılar yüzünden biçimsizleşmiş. Derisinde gözler, ağızlar ve dokunaçlar bir belirip bir kayboluyor. Bu derecede bir öteboyut bozunumunu başka bir şeyle karıştırmak mümkün değil.
languages.original_text: The beggar's corpse is disfigured by bony growths. Eyes, mouths, and tentacles are constantly appearing and disappearing in the ocean of his flesh. It is difficult to mistake warp distortion of this severity for anything else.

traits.locale_text: Dilencinin bedeni, kemiksi yapılarla biçimsiz bir hâle gelmiş. Derisinde gözler, ağızlar ve dokunaçlar bir belirip bir kayboluyor. Bu derecede bir öteboyut bozulmasını başka bir şeyle karıştırmak mümkün değil.
